code: export default function memoize(callback){var previous;var result;return function(){var hasChanged=false;for(var _len=arguments.length,dependencies=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){dependencies[_key]=arguments[_key];}if(previous){if(previous.length!==dependencies.length){hasChanged=true;}else{for(var i=0;i<previous.length;i++){if(previous[i]!==dependencies[i]){hasChanged=true;break;}}}}else{hasChanged=true;}previous=dependencies;if(hasChanged||result===undefined){result=callback.apply(void 0,dependencies);}return result;};}
